person_say: I didn't do well on my exam, and it's making me feel really discouraged. How can I regain my confidence?
animal_say: I'm sorry to hear that! What specific feelings are you experiencing, and how has this impacted your studies?

person_say: I'm feeling really frustrated and disappointed in myself. It's affected my motivation to study because I keep doubting my abilities. I just feel like giving up sometimes.
animal_say: It's tough to feel that way! Bruno the bear specializes in relaxation and building confidence. Want to meet him?

person_say: Yes, meeting Bruno sounds really nice! I would love to get some tips on relaxation and building my confidence.
animal_say: Great choice! Bruno will help you find relaxation and boost your confidence. Let's go see him!
